title: Nightmare Co-workers with Lisa Lampanelli
description:
On this episode Joe is joined by the absolutely iconic comedian Lisa Lampanelli. Often called the "Queen of Mean," we learn how she's channeling her inner-teacher to become the "Queen of Meaningful" with a new podcast. Lisa shares some amazing stories about her career and Joe shares a bold new haircut! They they get into emails with some fantastic and horrifying co-worker stories.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
